title: FS - T206 M. Brown Error Card
author: JerryTotino

posts.post_title: FS - T206 M. Brown Error Card
posts.post_content:
For sale: An M. Brown error card with doubling of the portrait silhouette which causes a shadow effect. I have seen a number of ghost overprints, but this particular error appears to be somewhat different due to the darker double image. This type of error is rarely ever found on a HOF card.

The card appears to be factory cut, but is smaller side to side and longer top to bottom than a regular T206. An added bonus is that it has a Sovereign back.

Asking $275 which includes shipping. Check or money orders only.

Thanks for looking.

Jerry

The card is sold.

Thanks,

Jerry
